meanings.definition: A citizen or soldier of ancient Rome.
meanings.sent1: The romans built strong roads in ancient times.
meanings.sent2: Many romans wore togas in ancient Rome.
meanings.sent3: The romans had to march long distances in their sandals.
meanings.sent4: The spirit of the romans lives on in modern Italy.
meanings.sent5: The romans were known for their disciplined army.

meanings.definition: The Latin language as used in ancient Rome.
meanings.sent1: Learning Latin helps understand the language of the romans.
meanings.sent2: The romans wrote important texts in Latin.
meanings.sent3: Imagine speaking like the romans did in ancient times!
meanings.sent4: Latin, the language of the romans, is still studied today.
meanings.sent5: The romans used Latin to communicate across their empire.

meanings.definition: A typeface with upright characters based on those used in ancient Roman inscriptions.
meanings.sent1: The book was printed in a font that resembled romans inscriptions.
meanings.sent2: The romans typeface is commonly used in academic papers.
meanings.sent3: The romans font gives a classic touch to the document.
meanings.sent4: The romans typeface adds a touch of history to the design.
meanings.sent5: The romans style font is easy to read and elegant.
